meanings.definition: The work or business of a cooper.
meanings.sent1: In the past, cooperages were essential for storing liquids.
meanings.sent2: The cooperages in town produce high-quality barrels.
meanings.sent3: The cooperages were so busy that they ran out of wood!
meanings.sent4: His mind was a cooperages of ideas, crafting and shaping thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The cooperages hummed with activity, creating vessels for various purposes.

meanings.definition: The place where barrels and casks are made.
meanings.sent1: We visited the cooperages to see how barrels are crafted.
meanings.sent2: The cooperages smell of fresh wood and sawdust.
meanings.sent3: The mice in the cooperages had a feast on spilled grains.
meanings.sent4: The cooperages stood like giants, guardians of the aging spirits.
meanings.sent5: The cooperages echoed with the sounds of hammering and shaping wood.
